r.d: This class allows you to communicate with FTP-servers more comfortable that the ftp-functions of PHP. Especially you can up- and download recursively.
r.n: This is the first rellease of Net_FTP. Until now, it only contains the basic class and the configuration-file. The API-documentation will be available soon on http://www.schlitt.info. There may be problems transfering a great amount of files to an ftp-server. When you recieve problems with this, please contact a maintainer for bug-report. BEWARE, THE API OF THIS CLASS MAY CHANGE IN THE NEXT FEW RELEASES!! I WILL CHANGE STATE TO beta, WHEN API IS FIXED!
